text: Kristen Fløgstad (born 11 April 1947) is a former Norwegian athlete from Søgne in Vest-Agder. He represented Kristiansands IF. He won the national championships in triple jump ten times (1968, 1970-71, 1973-76, 1979-80 and 1982) and in long jump six times (1967-68, 1973 and 1975-77), being awarded the King's Cup (kongepokal) once. His personal best result in long jump, 8.02 metres achieved on Bislett stadion on 4 August 1973, is still the Norwegian record. Fløgstad competed at the 1972 Summer Olympics, finishing 8th in the triple jump contest. title: Kristen Fløgstad
